title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 105.12 - Directors' fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 105.12 - Directors' fees

State Regulations

Include: Directors' fees and other compensation of directors for attendance at board or committee meetings. Other fees, compensation, and expenses paid to directors. Exclude: Commission to directors for the production of business (see commission and brokerage-direct). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
105.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
